subject: Confidental Messages
body:
Important News:
 
Dear member, thanks for using our software site.
We have been updating our software list and now have over 10,000
titles.
 
We created an account so you can check out our selections
Account Link:
http://www.Mbsoftwares.com/The00
 
Our software can be directly downloaded 1 minute after your
confirmation.
 
*If you don’t use your account link then our discounts will not
apply.
 
 
Terrell & Blake Online Software Inc.
Sales and Service
Certified GHY Software Outlet
 
 

If you are unable to view your personal greeting then:
http://www.Mbsoftwares.com/The00
